title: Urgot biography
body:
is it just me or did riot mess this sentence up from urgots new biography
 "Only when a Noxian agent arrived in the Dredge was Urgot was finally forced to confront his own past."

replies.body:
"Only when was a Noxian agent was arrived in the Dredge was Urgot was finally was forced to confront his was own past."

Awesome lore rito, 5/7 quality.

was

OOPS!

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

Someone must have been in beast mode late at night trying to get that page finished xD! I'm reaching out to the right people to get that fixed up for ya! Thanks for the heads up ^_^!

UPDATE: Info passed along, and you should be seeing that page get updated soonâ„¢ along with a few other typos.
